issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: FairScheduler allocated container should resetSchedulingOpportunities count of its priority

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
